name: Magehunter
description:
Magehunter™ Chronicles: Secrets of the Soul Gems is a classically-inspired RPG that combines puzzle-like stealth, tasty turn-based combat, and dynamic quick time event gameplay in a modern take on the classic games we love.  Below, you can download an alpha version of the game and check out our characters and gameplay. 

If you are interested in the project, please check out its website for more information! www.magehunter.net

Unfortunately, due to COVID-19, we have had to halt development. While the team was super excited to continue developing and publishing the game, we had to be realistic about the limitations of doing creative work and restrictions on travel during the pandemic.
